title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the SyncConflictResolver system, including the types of data and processes it should handle, the desired resolution strategies, the expected user experience, and the integration points with existing systems or data sources. Additionally, identify the target platforms, performance requirements, and any relevant compliance or regulatory standards.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the SyncConflictResolver system, including the main components, data flows, and integration points with existing systems.

title: Develop Conflict Detection Module
description: Implement the module responsible for detecting synchronization conflicts in data or processes based on the defined requirements.

title: Develop Resolution Suggestion Module
description: Implement the module responsible for suggesting resolutions for detected conflicts based on predefined strategies or machine learning algorithms.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the SyncConflictResolver system, including the presentation of detected conflicts and suggested resolutions, as well as user interaction for accepting or rejecting resolutions.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Implement the user interface based on the designed mockups and wireframes, integrating with the backend modules for conflict detection and resolution suggestion.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing and retrieving conflict detection and resolution data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the SyncConflictResolver system and its data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the SyncConflictResolver system, including automated builds, testing, and deployment to staging and production environments.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user documentation for the SyncConflictResolver system, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Conduct comprehensive testing of the SyncConflictResolver system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure it meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the SyncConflictResolver system to the production environment after successful testing and final approval.
